00.title: ALGEMENE WERFORGANISATIE
00.summary:
*   The contractor must install a temporary fence to enclose the construction site, equipped with lockable access points.
*   The contractor is responsible for creating and maintaining a site layout plan, including traffic management, access points, and the location of construction facilities and storage areas.
*   The contractor is responsible for providing and maintaining signage, lighting, and barriers around the construction site, conforming to traffic regulations.
*   A "Plaatsbeschrijving" (condition report) of the existing building must be created by an expert before and after the work.
*   Demolition work includes removing masonry elements, piping, floor coverings, wall elements, ceilings, and sanitary equipment.
*   The contractor must provide a work plan and as-built documentation.
*   The contractor must provide safety measures, including accident and fire insurance.
*   The contractor must provide scaffolding that meets specific standards and is properly erected.
*   The contractor is responsible for maintaining order and cleanliness on the construction site, including weekly cleanups and final cleaning.
*   The contractor must minimize noise and dust pollution.
*   The contractor must protect finished buildings and/or rooms and keep them in good condition until the preliminary acceptance.

01.title: VOORAFGAANDE WERKEN EN SLOOPWERKEN

03.title: OPEN RUWBOUW

07.title: GEVELSLUITINGEN

08.title: AANVOER- EN AFVOERLEIDINGEN
08.summary: No specific execution details found on pages 3-3.

09.title: VLOEREN
09.summary:
- The contractor must provide a work planning document in three copies before the start of work.
- The contractor must provide an "AS BUILT" dossier in three copies after the work is completed.
- The contractor must install a temporary fence to close off the construction site.
- The contractor must provide signage and lighting for the construction site.
- The contractor is responsible for safety measures during the works.

10.title: WANDEN
10.summary:
*   The contractor must provide an installation that enables them to perform the work to the satisfaction of the building management.
*   The contractor is responsible for maintaining order and cleanliness on the work site.
*   The contractor must take measures to protect adjacent areas from damage and dust.
*   The contractor must provide necessary ladders and scaffolding for working at height, complying with relevant regulations.
*   The contractor must submit a design for the construction site sign for approval.
No specific execution details found on pages 4-4.

11.title: PLAFONDS
11.summary:
- The contractor must provide an installation (material and equipment) that enables them to perform the work to the satisfaction of the administration.
- The contractor is responsible for weekly cleaning of the construction site and cleaning of site offices.
- The contractor must take all necessary measures to keep access roads to the site clean.
- The contractor must provide all sound-damping equipment on machines and materials.
- The contractor is obligated to protect the finished buildings and/or premises and keep them in good condition until the provisional acceptance.

13.title: VASTE UITRUSTINGEN
13.summary:
* The contractor must provide an installation that enables them to perform the work to the satisfaction of the building authority.
* The contractor is responsible for weekly cleaning of the construction site and cleaning of site facilities.
* The contractor must take all necessary measures to protect adjacent areas from damage and dust.
* The contractor must provide all necessary organizational and technical measures to ensure the safety of personnel and visitors on the site.
* The announcement of the site must be done with a site board, with the information and guidelines determined by the building authority. The contractor must submit a design for approval.

14.title: SANITAIRE TOESTELLEN
14.summary: No specific execution details found on pages 5-5.

15.title: SCHILDER - EN BEHANGWERKEN
15.summary:
- The contractor must provide an installation (material and equipment) that enables them to perform the work to the satisfaction of the administration.
- The contractor is responsible for the weekly cleaning of the construction site and cleaning of site rooms.
- The contractor must provide the necessary ladders and scaffolding. Scaffolding must meet specific NBN standards and a stability calculation must be performed.
- The contractor must provide a work planning in the form of graphic documents, in the form of planning of the type GANTT, on paper in 3 copies format A3.
- The contractor must make an "AS BUILT" dossier in three copies.

20.title: ONVOORZIENE LEVERINGEN EN WERKEN
20.summary:
- The contractor must install a temporary fence with lockable access points.
- Masonry work must adhere to specific NBN standards, including using BENOR-certified blocks/stones and specified mortar.
- Wooden elements must be treated with an A1-procédé and be sufficiently dry.
- The contractor is responsible for delivering an as-built dossier, including plans compatible with AUTOCAD 2000 or ALLPLAN.
- The contractor must provide and install sanitary equipment, including wall-mounted toilets, sinks, and urinals, adhering to specific dimensions and standards for materials and installation.
